text: The Long Kill is a 1999 American film. It was also known as Outlaw Justice. It was shot in Spain. The film was very popular on video.Outlaw Justice breaks PM sales record Anonymous. Video Business; Radnor Vol. 19, Iss. 22, (May 31, 1999): 27. ==Cast== *Willie Nelson *Kris Kristofferson ==References== ==External links== *Outlaw Justice at Letterbox DVD *The Long Kill at IMDb Category:American Western (genre) films Category:1999 films Category:Films shot in Spain Category:American films
title: The Long Kill
